description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes, layout, and responsive design of the application, including variables for light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container class, centers its content and provides background color from theme variables.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the logo element which features a spinning animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class styled with background color and flex layout for centering content.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links styled with theme color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling themes with responsive styling and hover effects.
